name: Add an Etsy shop's listings to a Google Sheet
description: Every time Etsy gets the listings of a shop, Make will automatically add their data to a sheet in Google Sheets. The example here uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xICfzRMFmizOZmtryhT6mIxhJduRMUl64wmLKGtF1Mg/edit#gid=0)
